BROADCASTING
TELECASTING
THE NEWSWEEKLY OF RADIO AND TELEVISION
1735 DeSales Street, Washington 6, D.C., MEtropolitan 8-1022
August 10, 1956
Mr* John H. Lerch
Psychological Warfare
8239 A.U.
APO 500
San Francisco, Calif*
Dear Johns
Many, many thanks for your letter of the 2nd. It certainly
was a pleasant surprise*.*it has been a long time.
**egarding your news release and program, it sounds terrific*
I suggest that you have the NAEB shoot along the material
(photo, background, etc.) and address it to Mr. Fred FitzÂ¬
gerald, News Editor*
Ifm sure you enjoy Japan and its many wonders. Let us know
how things go, and if there is anything we can do for you
at this end.
Very best wishes.
WASHINGTON
NEW YORK
CHICAGO
HOLLYWOOD
